summary.span: 代表可用名稱或索引存取的屬性集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attributes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlAttributeCollection` 擴充類別加上強型別協助程式方法。`XmlAttributeCollection` extends the class by adding strongly typed helper methods. 您可以使用這個類別來新增、 移除或修改集合中的屬性。You can use this class to add, remove, or modify attributes in the collection. `XmlAttributeCollection` 由屬性。`XmlAttributeCollection` is returned by the property.

related.span: 存取 DOM 中的屬性

span.span: Accessing Attributes in the DOM

related.span: 根據名稱或索引擷取的未排序節點

span.span: Unordered Node Retrieval by Name or Index
XML Document Object Model (DOM)

summary.span: 插入指定的屬性做為集合的最後一個節點。

span.span: Inserts the specified attribute as the last node in the collection.
The to append to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同名稱的屬性已經存在集合中，原始的屬性從集合中移除和`node`加入至集合結尾。If an attribute with the same name is already present in the collection, the original attribute is removed from the collection and `node` is added to the end of the collection. 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能文件物件模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會將新屬性加入至文件。The following example adds a new attribute to a document.
